snippet.title: KBS Gameplay trailer 0.01
snippet.description:
A quick showcase of Kuiper Belt Survivor's initial release early access gameplay.

Kuiper belt survivor is an arcade style bullet heaven, where every run is endless. It sets itself apart from other bullet heaven games by focusing more heavily on weapon customization, skill progression, complex stat interactions, and dynamic status effects.

This is Kuiper belt survivor in its roughest state, only the most basic game mechanics needed have been implemented. though even in this rough state there are well over 10,000 unique weapon possibilities. this will be quickly obsolete after the games official early access release on June 18, as there is already a significant update being prepared for release.
